        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> findAllReferencesByKeys(java.util.List<ch.decent.sdk.crypto.Address> keys)

        Get account object ids by public key addresses.

        Parameters:
        keys - formatted public keys of the account, eg. DCT5j2bMj7XVWLxUW7AXeMiYPambYFZfCcMroXDvbCfX1VoswcZG4
        Returns:
        a list of account object ids

      • getFullAccounts

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.Map> getFullAccounts(java.util.List<java.lang.String> namesOrIds,
                                                          boolean subscribe)

        Fetch all objects relevant to the specified accounts and subscribe to updates.

        Parameters:
        namesOrIds - list of account names or ids
        subscribe - true to subscribe to updates
        Returns:
        map of names or ids to account, or empty map if not present

      • findAll

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> findAll(java.lang.String searchTerm,
                                                   SearchAccountsOrder order,
                                                   ChainObject id,
                                                   int limit)

        Get names and IDs for registered accounts that match search term.

        Parameters:
        searchTerm - will try to partially match account name or id
        order - sort data by field
        id - object id to start searching from
        limit - number of items to get, max 1000
        Returns:
        list of found accounts

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> searchAccountHistory(ChainObject accountId,
                                                                ChainObject from,
                                                                SearchAccountHistoryOrder order,
                                                                int limit)
        Deprecated. 

        Search account history.

        Parameters:
        accountId - object id of the account, 1.2.*
        from - object id of the history object to start from, use ObjectType.getGenericId to ignore
        order - order of items
        limit - number of entries, max 100
        Returns:
        account history list

      • createCredentials

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.crypto.Credentials> createCredentials(java.lang.String account,
                                                                               java.lang.String privateKey)

        Create API credentials.

        Parameters:
        account - account name
        privateKey - private key in wif base58 format, eg. 5Jd7zdvxXYNdUfnEXt5XokrE3zwJSs734yQ36a1YaqioRTGGLtn
        Returns:
        credentials

      • createMemo

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.Memo> createMemo(java.lang.String message,
                                                                java.lang.String recipient,
                                                                ECKeyPair keyPair)

        Create a memo. Can be used in class TransferOperation, class AssetIssueOperation, class NftIssueOperation, class NftTransferOperation

        Parameters:
        message - text message to send
        recipient - account name or id, mandatory for encrypted message
        keyPair - sender's key pair, mandatory for encrypted message
        See Also:
        class TransferOperation, class AssetIssueOperation, class NftIssueOperation, class NftTransferOperation

      • createTransfer

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.TransferOperation> createTransfer(Credentials credentials,
                                                                                           java.lang.String nameOrId,
                                                                                           AssetAmount amount,
                                                                                           java.lang.String memo,
                                                                                           boolean encrypted,
                                                                                           Fee fee)

        Create a transfer operation.

        Parameters:
        credentials - account credentials
        nameOrId - account id or account name
        amount - amount to send with asset type
        memo - optional message
        encrypted - encrypted is visible only for sender and receiver, unencrypted is visible publicly
        fee - class Fee fee for the operation, by default the fee will be computed in DCT asset. When set to other then DCT, the request might fail if the asset is not convertible to DCT or conversion pool is not large enough
        Returns:
        a transaction confirmation

      • createTransfer

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.TransferOperation> createTransfer(Credentials credentials,
                                                                                           java.lang.String nameOrId,
                                                                                           AssetAmount amount,
                                                                                           java.lang.String memo,
                                                                                           boolean encrypted)

        Create a transfer operation.

        Parameters:
        credentials - account credentials
        nameOrId - account id or account name
        amount - amount to send with asset type
        memo - optional message
        encrypted - encrypted is visible only for sender and receiver, unencrypted is visible publicly
        Returns:
        a transaction confirmation

      • createAccountOperation

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.AccountCreateOperation> createAccountOperation(ChainObject registrar,
                                                                                                        java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                        Address address,
                                                                                                        Fee fee)

        Create a register new account operation.

        Parameters:
        registrar - account id used to register the new account
        name - new account name
        address - new account public key address
        fee - {@link AssetAmount} fee for the operation or asset id, if left undefined the fee will be computed in DCT asset. When set, the request might fail if the asset is not convertible to DCT or conversion pool is not large enough
        Returns:
        a transaction confirmation

      • createAccountOperation

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.AccountCreateOperation> createAccountOperation(ChainObject registrar,
                                                                                                        java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                        Address address)

        Create a register new account operation.

        Parameters:
        registrar - account id used to register the new account
        name - new account name
        address - new account public key address
        Returns:
        a transaction confirmation

      • create

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.TransactionConfirmation> create(Credentials registrar,
                                                                               java.lang.String name,
                                                                               Address address,
                                                                               Fee fee)

        Create a new account.

        Parameters:
        registrar - credentials used to register the new account
        name - new account name
        address - new account public key address
        fee - class Fee fee for the operation, by default the fee will be computed in DCT asset. When set to other then DCT, the request might fail if the asset is not convertible to DCT or conversion pool is not large enough
        Returns:
        a transaction confirmation

      • createUpdateOperation

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.AccountUpdateOperation> createUpdateOperation(java.lang.String nameOrId,
                                                                                                       Fee fee)

        Create update account operation. Fills model with actual account values.

        Parameters:
        nameOrId - account id or name
        fee - {@link AssetAmount} fee for the operation or asset id, if left undefined the fee will be computed in DCT asset. When set, the request might fail if the asset is not convertible to DCT or conversion pool is not large enough
        Returns:
        modifiable account update operation

      • createUpdateOperation

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.AccountUpdateOperation> createUpdateOperation(java.lang.String nameOrId)

        Create update account operation. Fills model with actual account values.

        Parameters:
        nameOrId - account id or name
        Returns:
        modifiable account update operation

      • update

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.TransactionConfirmation> update(Credentials credentials,
                                                                               AccountOptions options,
                                                                               Authority active,
                                                                               Authority owner,
                                                                               Fee fee)

        Update account

        Parameters:
        credentials - account credentials
        options - new account options
        active - new active authority
        owner - new owner authority
        fee - {@link AssetAmount} fee for the operation or asset id, if left undefined the fee will be computed in DCT asset. When set, the request might fail if the asset is not convertible to DCT or conversion pool is not large enough
        Returns:
        a transaction confirmation
